verbs.description: [ARG0: roseville police] [V: searching] [ARG1: for two wallet thieves] the roseville police department is trying to track down two women who have stolen wallets from people at several stores across roseville they say many of those stores are in an area near roseville square off douglas and harding boulevards harding boulevards police rob baquera douglas wallet roseville roseville police department roseville square
